name: Mustang Survival Callan Waterproof Pants - Women's
description: Navigating waters when the wind is howling and the sky is threatening is challenging enough  ̶  without worrying about what you're wearing. These pants are designed to move with you, running around on deck or taking on rapids. The waterproof-breathable offers protection, so you can forget you're on a boat in a downpour.Made of MarineSpec™ MP, a lightweight 3-layer waterproof-breathable fabric.Stretch fabric moves with you.Durable MarineSpec™ BP reinforcements on seat and knees.Cinchable waist provides a snug fit.Ankle closures are built for deck shoes and will accommodate boots.Thigh pocket to keep the essentials handy.Fully seam sealed to keep water from seeping in.
